participant_1.background:
I recently got to share my love of sports with a larger audience.
I love to watch romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good.
I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind.
I do not own a home, but I do enjoy traveling and sharing my experiences with the world.
i read tons of books.

participant_2.background:
I'm not in a band, but I like Bon Jovi and I've owned two Mustangs.
i love new technology.
I read a book with my cats every morning before breakfast.
I am not rich, but I am fortunate enough to have parents who support my passion for filmmaking.
i started working at google last week on self driving car research.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I love reading books in the morning with my cats!
I love reading books too! What are your favorite books?
I have a lot of favorites, but one of my all time favorites is "To Kill a Mockingbird."
I have heard great things about that book, but I have never read it.
It is a classic for a reason! It is such a well written and thought provoking book.
I will have to check it out! What else do you like to do for fun?
I also love watching movies and listening to music. I am a huge fan of Bon Jovi.
Bon Jovi is great! I love their music.
They are one of my favorite bands of all time. I have seen them in concert several times.
I have not been to a Bon Jovi concert yet, but I would love to go.
You should go if you get the chance! They put on a great show.
I will definitely keep that in mind.
I am also a big fan of new technology. I love learning about new gadgets and how they work.
I am not very tech savvy, but I am trying to learn more.
It is never too late to learn! There are a lot of great resources available online.
I will have to check them out.
I also recently started working at Google on self driving car research.
That is so cool! I have heard a lot about self driving cars.
It is a very exciting field! I am really enjoying working on it.
I bet! It sounds like you have a lot of interesting hobbies.
I do! I am lucky that I have a lot of interests.
It sounds like you are a very busy person.
I am, but I try to make time for all of my hobbies.
That is great! I am trying to do the same thing
